subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|手|alt1=扌|t1=hand|察|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – wipe, scrub by hand.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[rub]]
# to be [[close]] to; to be [[near]]
# to [[wipe]]; to [[scour]]; to [[scrub]]
# to [[spread]] ([[paste]] etc.); to [[apply]]
# to [[shred]] ([[melon]]s and [[fruit]]s)
# {{lb|zh|slang|euphemistic}} {{zh-alt-form|肏|to [[fuck]]}}
